content: I am reminded of a comment by R W Emerson, “The objection to conforming to usages that have become dead to you is, that it scatters your force. It loses your time and blurs the impression of your character.”I must be a half century older than Preethi, but she has just given me the nudge to get on with things I want to do. Why so late — you know family, children, schools, college — ? Just better late than never. The web site, http://preethikasireddy.me/, is impressive.
